name: ðŸš€ Universal Deploy
description: One button deploy for any repo. If inside a repo, deploys it. If given a name, deploys that repo. Auto-start + logging built-in.
script:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail

# Import utils
source ./scripts/deploy_utils.sh

# Decide repo name
if [ $# -gt 0 ]; then
  REPO_NAME="$1"
else
  REPO_NAME=$(basename $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel))
fi

# Smart auto-start + deploy
ensure_start_script
finalize_deploy "$REPO_NAME"
